text: Pump Up the Valuum is the eighth studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. Pump Up the Valuum was released on June 13, 2000. The producers of the album were Ryan Greene and Fat Mike. The title of the album is purposely spelled wrong to avoid a lawsuit with Valium and is a play on words. ==Songs== Category:2000 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: Pump Up the Valuum
